file_content.text: I hope the resistance doesn't cave too easily. I do enjoy their struggles.
Balmorra certainly attracts our order--like flies to fresh meat. Any news from the slaughter?
I hope you're enjoying our war, agent. Come to pacify the resistance?
I've heard of you, mercenary. How fares your hunt?
Balmorra's resistance is bleeding out, but too slowly. Any news from the battle?
I've discovered a series of secret resistance supply caches. Interested?
Oh. Oh this is rich.
Tai Cordan... stubborn fool! Nobody hides supplies from the Empire! Now they're ours.
Use the exiles' bounty to strengthen the Empire. Then, crush them.
Recover the supplies.
A wise move. I'll see that it's carried out.
Set the equipment ablaze. Let the exiles watch their hope burn.
Destroy the supplies.
Brilliant, and delicious. I'll set the blaze myself.
Rig the caches with explosives. Then leak their location to the Republic.
Set a trap.
Brilliant. I'll see it done at once.
Use the data how you want. Just pay me.
Credits are my only concern.
Of course. Exceptional work demands equal pay.
I want full recognition.
Of course, of course. They'll hear your name just as soon as I put this intel to use.
Whatever.
You set a ferocious example for us all. May the Force free you.
We'll smother the resistance soon enough with intel like this. Well done, agent.
You've chosen the right side, hunter. Keep hammering the resistance. There's good money in their demise.
We'll choke the life from the resistance with more victories like this. I can't wait.
Balmorra is scarred by battle. I can almost hear its screams.
